shaker.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a container with holes in the lid, used to shake salt, sugar etc onto food
shaker.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a container in which drinks are mixed
shaker.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a small container for shaking dice
shaker.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a member of a US religious group who lived together and had a simple way of life. Shaker furniture is made in the plain, simple, and attractive style that Shakers used to make things
shaker.translation[2].definitions[0].def: relating to a style of wooden furniture of the kind made by the Shakers, which is known for being simple and well-made, and has become fashionable
shaker.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: an attractive set of Shaker chairs
